rows.label: qst700502_msg0001
rows.name:
To create the requested item, one of the
necessary materials is a rare ore called
Purestone, which can only be gathered at night.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0002
rows.name:
As for the location, it should
be around Hangnail Crossing.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0003
rows.name:
It's usually mixed in with
the rocks and can only be
identified at night.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0004
rows.name:
I knew it wasn't a job for me, but
I lost to the client's passion and
ended up wanting to help him out.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0005
rows.name:
Sorry, but lend me your strength.
In return, when you're in trouble,
I'll help out as much as I can.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, but when that time comes, ask me
for escort or extermination jobs.
Don't expect delicate work from me.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0101
rows.name:
Oh, did you manage to
get the Purestone?

rows.label: qst700502_msg0102
rows.name: As expected. I was right to ask you.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0103
rows.name:
"Lovers' Whispers"... it's
embarrassing to even say, but
let me know when it's done.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0104
rows.name:
Until then, I'll keep the
client calm over here.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0105
rows.name:
He's so excited for it to
be finished that he's
apparently not sleeping much.
